TopicTitle: [Answered] I can code my planet with just notepad right?

Articles.Content:
I can code my planet with just notepad right?  I dont need any fancy coding thing right? And how do you figure out the spacing? 

Edited July 15, 2021 by Dr. Kerbal

Notepad is fine. Sample configs and proper spacing can be found on the Kopernicus Wiki (https://kopernicus.github.io/wiki/main/ConfigNodes.html). This is also a great resource for figuring out what variables you can alter and what their functions are.
